      • asClassType

        public ClassType asClassType(java.lang.String errorMessage,
                             Location l)
                      throws ContextualError
        Returns the same object, as type ClassType, if possible. Throws ContextualError(errorMessage, l) otherwise. Can be seen as a cast, but throws an explicit contextual error when the cast fails.
        Throws:
        ContextualError
